verses.verse: Again the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, cause Jerusalem<WH3389> to know<WH3045> her abominations<WH8441>;

and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136> unto Jerusalem<WH3389>: Thy birth<WH4351> and thy nativity<WH4138> is of the land<WH776> of the Canaanite<WH3669>; the Amorite<WH567> was thy father<WH1>, and thy mother<WH517> was a Hittite<WH2850>.

And as for thy nativity<WH4138>, in the day<WH3117> thou wast born<WH3205> thy navel<WH8270> was not cut<WH3772>, neither wast thou washed<WH7364> in water<WH4325> to cleanse<WH4935> thee<WH4414>; thou wast not salted at all<WH4414>, nor swaddled<WH2853> at all<WH2853>.

No eye<WH5869> pitied<WH2347> thee<WH6213>, to do any<WH259> of these things unto thee<WH2550>, to have compassion upon thee<WH7993>; but thou wast cast out in the open<WH6440> field<WH7704>, for that thy person<WH5315> was abhorred<WH1604>, in the day<WH3117> that thou wast born<WH3205>.

And when I passed<WH5674> by thee<WH7200>, and saw thee weltering<WH947> in thy blood<WH1818>, I said<WH559> unto thee<WH1818>, Though thou art in thy blood, live<WH2421>; yea<WH559>, I said unto thee<WH1818>, Though thou art in thy blood, live<WH2421>.

I caused<WH5414> thee to multiply<WH7233> as that which groweth<WH6780> in the field<WH7704>, and thou didst increase<WH7235> and wax great<WH1431>, and thou attainedst<WH935> to excellent<WH5716> ornament<WH5716>; thy breasts<WH7699> were fashioned<WH3559>, and thy hair<WH8181> was grown<WH6779>; yet thou wast naked<WH5903> and bare<WH6181>.

Now when I passed<WH5674> by thee<WH7200>, and looked upon thee<WH6256>, behold, thy time was the time<WH6256> of love<WH1730>; and I spread<WH6566> my skirt<WH3671> over thee<WH3680>, and covered thy nakedness<WH6172>: yea<WH7650>, I sware unto thee<WH935>, and entered into a covenant<WH1285> with thee<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, and thou becamest mine.
Then washed<WH7364> I thee with water<WH4325>; yea<WH7857>, I thoroughly washed away thy blood<WH1818> from thee<WH5480>, and I anointed thee with oil<WH8081>.

I clothed<WH3847> thee also with broidered work<WH7553>, and shod<WH5274> thee with sealskin<WH8476>, and I girded<WH2280> thee about with fine linen<WH8336>, and covered<WH3680> thee with silk<WH4897>.
And I decked<WH5710> thee with ornaments<WH5716>, and I put<WH5414> bracelets<WH6781> upon thy hands<WH3027>, and a chain<WH7242> on thy neck<WH1627>.
And I put<WH5414> a ring<WH5141> upon thy nose<WH639>, and ear-rings<WH5694> in thine ears<WH241>, and a beautiful<WH8597> crown<WH5850> upon thy head<WH7218>.

Thus wast thou decked<WH5710> with gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701>; and thy raiment<WH4403> was of fine linen<WH8336>, and silk<WH4897>, and broidered work<WH7553>; thou didst eat<WH398> fine flour<WH5560>, and honey<WH1706>, and oil<WH8081>; and thou wast exceeding<WH3966> beautiful<WH3302>, and thou didst prosper<WH6743> unto royal estate<WH4410>.

And thy renown<WH8034> went forth<WH3318> among the nations<WH1471> for thy beauty<WH3308>; for it was perfect<WH3632>, through my majesty<WH1926> which I had put<WH7760> upon thee<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

But thou didst trust<WH982> in thy beauty<WH3308>, and playedst the harlot<WH2181> because of thy renown<WH8034>, and pouredst out<WH8210> thy whoredoms<WH8457> on every one that passed by<WH5674>; his it was.

And thou didst take<WH3947> of thy garments<WH899>, and madest for thee high places<WH1116> decked<WH6213> with divers colors<WH2921>, and playedst the harlot<WH2181> upon them<WH935>: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

Thou didst also take<WH3947> thy fair<WH8597> jewels<WH3627> of my gold<WH2091> and of my silver<WH3701>, which I had given<WH5414> thee<WH6213>, and madest for thee images<WH6754> of men<WH2145>, and didst play the harlot with them<WH2181>;
and thou tookest<WH3947> thy broidered<WH7553> garments<WH899>, and coveredst<WH3680> them<WH5414>, and didst set mine oil<WH8081> and mine incense<WH7004> before them<WH6440>.

My bread<WH3899> also which I gave<WH5414> thee<WH5560>, fine flour, and oil<WH8081>, and honey<WH1706>, wherewith I fed<WH398> thee<WH5414>, thou didst even set it before<WH6440> them for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381>; and thus it was<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

Moreover thou hast taken<WH3947> thy sons<WH1121> and thy daughters<WH1323>, whom thou hast borne<WH3205> unto me<WH2076>, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be devoured<WH398>. Were thy whoredoms<WH8457> a small matter<WH4592>,
that thou hast slain<WH7819> my children<WH1121>, and delivered<WH5414> them up<WH5674>, in causing them to pass through the fire unto them?

And in all thine abominations<WH8441> and thy whoredoms<WH8457> thou hast not remembered<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of thy youth<WH5271>, when thou wast naked<WH5903> and bare<WH6181>, and wast weltering<WH947> in thy blood<WH1818>.
And it is come to pass after<WH310> all thy wickedness<WH7451>, (woe<WH188>, woe<WH188> unto thee<WH5002>! saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>,)
that thou hast built<WH1129> unto thee a vaulted place<WH1354>, and hast made<WH6213> thee a lofty place<WH7413> in every street<WH7339>.

Thou hast built<WH1129> thy lofty place<WH7413> at the head<WH7218> of every way<WH1870>, and hast made thy beauty<WH3308> an abomination<WH8581>, and hast opened<WH6589> thy feet<WH7272> to every one that passed by<WH5674>, and multiplied<WH7235> thy whoredom<WH8457>.

Thou hast also committed fornication<WH2181> with the Egyptians<WH1121>, thy neighbors<WH7934>, great<WH1432> of flesh<WH1320>; and hast multiplied<WH7235> thy whoredom<WH8457>, to provoke me to anger<WH3707>.

Behold therefore<WH5186>, I have stretched out my hand<WH3027> over thee<WH1639>, and have diminished thine ordinary<WH2706> food<WH5414>, and delivered thee unto the will<WH5315> of them that hate<WH8130> thee<WH1323>, the daughters of the Philistines<WH6430>, that are ashamed<WH3637> of thy lewd<WH2154> way<WH1870>.

Thou hast played the harlot<WH2181> also with the Assyrians<WH1121>, because<WH1115> thou wast insatiable<WH7646>; yea<WH2181>, thou hast played the harlot with them<WH7654>, and yet thou wast not satisfied.
Thou hast moreover multiplied<WH7235> thy whoredom<WH8457> unto the land<WH776> of traffic<WH3667>, unto Chaldea<WH3778>; and yet thou wast not satisfied<WH7646> herewith<WH2063>.
How weak<WH535> is thy heart<WH3826>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>, seeing thou doest<WH6213> all these things<WH4639>, the work of an impudent7986, Ruth2 harlot<WH2181>;

in that thou buildest<WH1129> thy vaulted place<WH1354> at the head<WH7218> of every way<WH1870>, and makest<WH6213> thy lofty place<WH7413> in every street<WH7339>, and hast not been as a harlot<WH2181>, in that thou scornest<WH7046> hire<WH868>.
A wife<WH802> that committeth adultery<WH5003>! that taketh<WH3947> strangers<WH2114> instead of her husband<WH376>!

They give<WH5414> gifts<WH5078> to all harlots<WH2181>; but thou givest<WH5414> thy gifts<WH5083> to all thy lovers<WH157>, and bribest<WH7809> them<WH935>, that they may come unto thee on every side<WH5439> for thy whoredoms<WH8457>.

And thou art different<WH2016> from other women<WH802> in thy whoredoms<WH8457>, in that none followeth<WH310> thee to play the harlot<WH2181>; and whereas thou givest<WH5414> hire<WH868>, and no hire<WH868> is given<WH5414> unto thee<WH1961>, therefore thou art different<WH2016>.
Wherefore <WH2181>, O harlot, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>:

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, Because thy filthiness<WH5178> was poured out<WH8210>, and thy nakedness<WH6172> uncovered<WH1540> through thy whoredoms<WH8457> with thy lovers<WH157>; and because of all the idols<WH1544> of thy abominations<WH8441>, and for the blood<WH1818> of thy children<WH1121>, that thou didst give unto them<WH5414>;

therefore behold<WH6908>, I will gather all thy lovers<WH157>, with whom thou hast taken pleasure<WH6149>, and all them that thou hast loved<WH157>, with all them that thou hast hated<WH8130>; I will even gather<WH6908> them against thee on every side<WH5439>, and will uncover<WH1540> thy nakedness<WH6172> unto them<WH7200>, that they may see all thy nakedness<WH6172>.

And I will judge<WH8199> thee<WH5003>, as women that break wedlock and shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818> are judged<WH4941>; and I will bring<WH5414> upon thee the blood<WH1818> of wrath<WH2534> and jealousy<WH7068>.

I will also give<WH5414> thee into their hand<WH3027>, and they shall throw down<WH2040> thy vaulted place<WH1354>, and break down<WH5422> thy lofty places<WH7413>; and they shall strip<WH6584> thee of thy clothes<WH899>, and take<WH3947> thy fair<WH8597> jewels<WH3627>; and they shall leave<WH3240> thee naked<WH5903> and bare<WH6181>.
They shall also bring up<WH5927> a company<WH6951> against thee<WH7275>, and they shall stone thee with stones<WH68>, and thrust thee through<WH1333> with their swords<WH2719>.

And they shall burn<WH8313> thy houses<WH1004> with fire<WH784>, and execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> upon thee in the sight<WH5869> of many<WH7227> women<WH802>; and I will cause thee to cease<WH7673> from playing the harlot<WH2181>, and thou shalt also give<WH5414> no hire any more<WH868>.
So will I cause my wrath<WH2534> toward thee to rest<WH5117>, and my jealousy<WH7068> shall depart<WH5493> from thee<WH8252>, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry<WH3707>.

Because thou hast not remembered<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of thy youth<WH5271>, but hast raged<WH7264> against me in all these things<WH1887>; therefore, behold, I also will bring<WH5414> thy way<WH1870> upon thy head<WH7218>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: and thou shalt not commit<WH6213> this lewdness<WH2154> with all thine abominations<WH8441>.
Behold <WH4911>, every one that useth proverbs shall use this proverb<WH4911> against thee<WH559>, saying, As is the mother<WH517>, so is her daughter<WH1323>.

Thou art the daughter<WH1323> of thy mother<WH517>, that loatheth<WH1602> her husband<WH376> and her children<WH1121>; and thou art the sister<WH269> of thy sisters<WH269>, who loathed<WH1602> their husbands<WH582> and their children<WH1121>: your mother<WH517> was a Hittite<WH2850>, and your father<WH1> an Amorite<WH567>.

And thine elder<WH1419> sister<WH269> is Samaria<WH8111>, that dwelleth<WH3427> at thy left hand<WH8040>, she and her daughters<WH1323>; and thy younger<WH6996> sister<WH269>, that dwelleth<WH3427> at thy right hand<WH3225>, is Sodom<WH5467> and her daughters<WH1323>.

Yet hast thou not walked<WH1980> in their ways<WH1870>, nor done<WH6213> after their abominations<WH8441>; but<WH6985>, as if that were a very little<WH4592> thing<WH7843>, thou wast more corrupt than they<WH2004> in all thy ways<WH1870>.

As I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, Sodom<WH5467> thy sister<WH269> hath not done<WH6213>, she nor her daughters<WH1323>, as thou hast done<WH6213>, thou and thy daughters<WH1323>.

Behold <WH5771>, this was the iniquity of thy sister<WH269> Sodom<WH5467>: pride<WH1347>, fulness<WH7653> of bread<WH3899>, and prosperous<WH7962> ease<WH8252> was in her and in her daughters<WH1323>; neither did she strengthen<WH2388> the hand<WH3027> of the poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34>.
And they were haughty<WH1361>, and committed<WH6213> abomination<WH8441> before<WH6440> me<WH5493>: therefore I took them away as I saw good<WH7200>.

Neither hath Samaria<WH8111> committed<WH2398> half<WH2677> of thy sins<WH2403>; but thou hast multiplied<WH7235> thine abominations<WH8441> more than they<WH2007>, and hast justified<WH6663> thy sisters<WH269> by all thine abominations<WH8441> which thou hast done<WH6213>.

Thou also<WH5375>, bear thou thine own shame<WH3639>, in that thou hast given judgment<WH6419> for thy sisters<WH269>; through thy sins<WH2403> that thou hast committed more abominable<WH8581> than they<WH2004>, they are more righteous<WH6663> that thou<WH954>: yea, be thou also confounded, and bear<WH5375> thy shame<WH3639>, in that thou hast justified<WH6663> thy sisters<WH269>.

And I will turn again<WH7725> their captivity<WH7622>, the captivity<WH7622> of Sodom<WH5467> and her daughters<WH1323>, and the captivity<WH7622> of Samaria<WH8111> and her daughters<WH1323>, and the captivity<WH7622> of thy captives<WH7622> in the midst of them<WH8432>;
that thou mayest bear<WH5375> thine own shame<WH3639>, and mayest be ashamed<WH3637> because of all that thou hast done<WH6213>, in that thou art a comfort unto them<WH5162>.

And thy sisters<WH269>, Sodom<WH5467> and her daughters<WH1323>, shall return<WH7725> to their former estate<WH6927>; and Samaria<WH8111> and her daughters<WH1323> shall return<WH7725> to their former estate<WH6927>; and thou and thy daughters<WH1323> shall return<WH7725> to your former estate<WH6927>.
For thy sister<WH269> Sodom<WH5467> was not mentioned<WH8052> by thy mouth<WH6310> in the day<WH3117> of thy pride<WH1347>,

before thy wickedness<WH7451> was uncovered<WH1540>, as at the time<WH6256> of the reproach<WH2781> of the daughters<WH1323> of Syria<WH758>, and of all that are round about<WH5439> her<WH1323>, the daughters of the Philistines<WH6430>, that do despite<WH7590> unto thee round about<WH5439>.
Thou hast borne<WH5375> thy lewdness<WH2154> and thine abominations<WH8441>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
For thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: I will also deal<WH6213> with thee as thou hast done<WH6213>, who hast despised<WH959> the oath<WH423> in breaking<WH6565> the covenant<WH1285>.
Nevertheless I will remember<WH2142> my covenant<WH1285> with thee in the days<WH3117> of thy youth<WH5271>, and I will establish<WH6965> unto thee an everlasting<WH5769> covenant<WH1285>.

Then shalt thou remember<WH2142> thy ways<WH1870>, and be ashamed<WH3637>, when thou shalt receive<WH3947> thy sisters<WH269>, thine elder<WH1419> sisters and thy younger<WH6996>; and I will give<WH5414> them unto thee for daughters<WH1323>, but not by thy covenant<WH1285>.
And I will establish<WH6965> my covenant<WH1285> with thee<WH3045>; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah<WH3068>;

that thou mayest remember<WH2142>, and be confounded<WH954>, and never open<WH6610> thy mouth<WH6310> any more<WH6440>, because of thy shame<WH3639>, when I have forgiven<WH3722> thee all that thou hast done<WH6213>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
